span.p: Farmington Elementary, Kewaskum Middle School and Kewaskum High School will continue to offer their Annual Plant Sale Fundraiser. More information about the sale, how to order and pick-up dates visittheir website Kewaskum Plant Sale. All orders aredue April 27, 2020.
Learn more about the 4K Programor5K Program and how to register your child for the 2020-21 school year.

link.script: $(document).ready(function () { var firstLoad = true; $('#datepicker').datepicker({ prevText: ' ', nextText: ' ', onSelect: function (dateText, inst) { if (!firstLoad) { var selected_date = new Date(dateText); var additional_url = 'date/' + selected_date.getFullYear() + '-' + (parseInt(selected_date.getMonth()) + 1) + '-' + selected_date.getDate() + '/view/day/';; var calendar_url = "http://www.eastcentralconferencewi.org/public/genie/753/school/88/" + additional_url; window.open(calendar_url, 'Calendar', 'location=1,status=1,scrollbars=yes, width=1366,height=800,center=' + (screen.availHeight / 2 - 300) + ',center=' + (screen.availWidth / 2 - 300)); } firstLoad = false; } }); });

div.p: NONDISCRIMINATION AND ACCESS TO EQUAL EDUCATIONAL OPPORTUNITY Policy 2260

The Kewaskum School District does not discriminate on the basis of sex, race, color, religion, creed, age, national origin, ancestry, pregnancy, marital status or parental status, sexual orientation, or disability. For more information view nondiscrimination clause or visit www.kewaskumschools.org.
